title: Shopping mall
review: It is beautiful property in Agra city,

title: Not Good At all
review: Shops was closed and Mcdonald is good

title: Deserted
review: Only a few shops are open (like 5 on a three level mall). Look deserted. Not worth it, don't waste your time. Only a McDonald.

title: So sad
review: Most of the shops have closed and it is a really depressing experience to go there.  There is a McDonald’s there which is still open.  So, unless you want a McDonald’s meal, don’t go there.  And, don’t forget, in India, even the mighty McDonald’s can’t serve beef burgers.

title: Walking dead special edition
review: I felt like I was casting In an episode of the walking dead. Majority of shops were closed, had no doors, or demolished inside. There is an upstairs department that host a haunted house show but walking in to that building you’ve entered the real thing. Place is deserted with only a handful of shops open trying hard to survive. Mac Donald’s is at the mall this is the only thing going for this place.

title: Nice location
review: This mall was very near to our hotel and we often went there and enjoyed the burgers and french fries at Mc Donalds.There is lack of maintenance and many shops seemed to be closed.There is also a place to sit outside and eat.Juice and french fry stalls are outside and autos are easily available here for going to Taj Mahal

title: Great place to hang out!
review: Mac Donalds is located at groud floor. Grab snacks and burgers at your wish! Very easily accessible location.

title: Dont go
review: Located near to four point hotel. Can be reach by auto. No shop inside the shop. Just some bar and spa shops inside. Just have a McDonald's in ground floor. Don't go to waste your time and money.

title: Carnival cinema
review: Never ever visit this cinema as this is really unhygienic and nit at all clean ...huge bad odour inside threature and chairs are not clean.

title: good
review: agra has only 2 to 3 malls. tdi is one of them. it is not maintained properly and needs maintenance. overall it is good with plenty of food stall including McD.

title: One of the Good Place
review: If you are really a mall lover & want to do branded shopping then this is the best place to do so. You will find all the best brands over here, but to have a reasonable local shopping then local market is best to buy shoes.

title: Lol
review: This is actually a joke to be called a mall it has absolutely nothing, you enter and come out right back, the cinema theater there bad actually worst, it stinks bad seats, staff rude  in fact this place is yak

title: Horrible mall in disrepair!
review: This place was supposedly build in 2008, so how could it already be in such a horrible state of disrepair?  My daughter accurately described it as a 'post apocalyptic' mall.  Rain water was pouring in from the shoddy roof above, leaving considerable puddles on the floor, and there were only a handful of shops open on the main level, while the 2nd and 3rd levels were vacant.

title: A dying mall.
review: TDI is a mall on its death bed.The security at the entrance frisks the visitors even though nothing in the mall. In the evening it appears like a ghost house. The only place with life is the McDonald's shop which has an opening to the main road. The cinema,reliance BIG on the top floor may be the other place which sustains the mall.

title: Good for McDonalds and ATM
review: There is hardly anything in the mall. There is a cinéma at top floor. I went There for the ATM. There us a McDonalds on the ground floor. There are two sovinier shops. Nothing else. No brands and no shops. Waste of time.

title: not to be called a mall
review: This is a mall TDI Mall, not to be called as a mall ..... Almost 90 % of the shops are already being closed & no much rush is there and nobody comes there for anything . Only I went there was for having a pizza of dominos , rest i didnt find anything useful

title: Excellent mall.
review: This mall has bunjee jumping which everyone loves.Shops are very beautiful and having a good stock.There are elevators convienient for everyone.

title: Just like zombie mall vr
review: This mall just like the mall in left 4 dead.  McDonald is the base for starting your game. You can gather your teammates here. After leaving McDonald, the mall is absolutely silence. If you make any sounds, undefined creatures will come out,  follow the source of the sound and get you

title: Poor guy killed by the 'enthusiasm' of Agraites
review: This mall once used to be a jewel of the city. It was happening & full of life. But I don't know may be Mall owner's attitude & greed made it out of reach to purchase a shop here on reasonable prices. Remaining was done by the poor attitude of Agraites who probably always wanted to just take a walk & go home.

title: Mc donald's
review: Drive thru, liked it.

title: CLOSED
review: Not a mall at all. The cinema is also now closed (according to our hotel staff). This place is dead. We choose this side of town because of the mall and are extremely disappointed!

title: Waste of time
review: Don't go there nothing waste of time only McDonald's two three shops nothing special dirty full of mosquitoes Jesus don't go

title: Air Conditioning
review: The only real positive from this mall is that the individual shops are air conditioned. We wanted to go to the movies but there were no listings and the lady behind the counter would not even attempt to hep us. The only positive were the nice happy security guards who were very pleasant.

title: Abandoned mall
review: It has something of an apocalyptic atmosphere but the mall is really abandoned and old. You can find nothing there! The movies are great tough, since the cinema is still intact.

title: ONLY A HANDFUL OF SHOPS STILL OPEN, DON'T GO
review: Not sure what happened but this isn't the first mall I've been to in this country, where it felt like I was walking around post-apocalypse. All the shops have shut down, it's a ghost town. Three floors and we  couldn't even buy toothpaste. Mcds is open and that's about it, couple of random shady spas inside, and a sari shop - so strange. Oh also the cinema plays two or three films at a time max, and nothing Hollywood.
